DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : ROUND OF 16 ; SPOTLIGHT ; EIGHT IS ENOUGH
DOC.TEXT: Brazil ranks first on the all-time list of expulsions with the ejection of Leonardo . Brazil has eight : Machado and Zeze in 1938 ; Humberto and Nilton Santos in 1954 ; Garrincha in 1962 ; Luis Pereira in 1974 and Ricardo in 1990 . ELLIOTT ALMOND
